div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 568 Dalmatia, central, between Obrovac and Starigrad, Yugoslavia, 1958-1959 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 40+ AE Numidia Disposition: dispersed Pegan, Bull. d'archeologie et d'histoire dalmates 6 1 (1959), pp. 154-6, illus. (4)
